text: Aminah bint Wahb ( ; died 577 AD) was the mother of the prophet Muhammad.Muhammad Mustafa Al-A'zami (2003), The History of The Qur'anic Text: From Revelation to Compilation: A Comparative Study with the Old and New Testaments, p.22, 24. UK Islamic Academy. . ==References== Category:Family of Muhammad Category:577 deaths Category:Arab people Category:Year of birth unknown
title: Aminah
